DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study investigate effect silicone hydrogel contact lenses conjunctival flora period 6 month daily wear . A secondary aim compare level microbial contamination silicone hydrogel lenses daily wear .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Silicone Hydrogel Contact Lenses Conjunctival Flora
DOC.criteria: Is correctable least 6/9 distance visual acuity eye spherical contact lens . Is current full time soft contact lens wearer . Has clinically significant anterior eye finding . Has active ocular disease Has systemic disease might interfere contact lens wear Is use systemic topical medication affect ocular health . Has preexist ocular irritation would preclude contact lens fitting . Has ocular pathology severe insufficiency lacrimal secretion ( dry eye ) would affect wear contact lens . Has undergone corneal refractive surgery . Is pregnant , lactate planning pregnancy . Is participate concurrent clinical trial . Has latex sensitivity .
